attributes.action: keep our only specialist police human trafficking unit OPEN!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On November 10, 2008 the news broke that Britain's only specialist police human trafficking unit is to be shut down after two years because of a lack of funding. 

The unit run by the Metropolitan police in our Capital is to be closed.

A Scotland Yard spokesperson said "From April 2009, that money will no longer be available, and the Met does not have the additional funds to keep the team running in its current format whilst meeting other existing policing requirements"

We petition to keep this unit open. For the government to fund this important unit as necessary to help prevent and stop trafficking within the UK. This unit saves people's lives!
